title: The Lobbyist Who Flew Too Close to the Sun: WSJ's Brody Mullins
description: Brody Mullins, Investigative Reporter at the Wall Street Journal, tells Chuck the story of Evan Morris, a high-flying pharmaceutical lobbyist in Washington who offers a dark lesson for D.C. power-brokers.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
